SELECT ITEM.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_INTRO , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , CATE_CODE , ROWNUM FROM ITEM ITEM, ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE ITEM.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND ITEM_STATUS = 2 AND ROWNUM < 21 ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC
